Name: lime production, hydraulic | lime, hydraulic | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2394:Manufacture of cement, lime and plaster
Description: Copy of the clinker production technology with mainly adjustments of the energy amount and the emissions. Additionally some water for the hydration has been included.
